item.title: Version 1.6
item.description:
Sotto 1.6 - App Picker & Enhanced Modes

  • App Picker: Browse and select apps from /Applications instead of typing names
  • Website Matching: Add website domains to match when browsing (e.g., github.com)
  • Chip UI: Selected apps and websites shown as removable chips
  • Default Instructions: Editable default instructions in App Modes tab
  • Override Toggle: Each mode can optionally override default instructions
  • Automatic migration from old format to new structured data

item.title: Version 1.5
item.description:
Sotto 1.5 - Navigation Redesign

  • New Navigation: Reorganized sidebar with clearer tab names
  • Settings Sections: Split into General, Transcription, and System
  • Help Tab: New Getting Started guide and Keyboard Shortcuts reference
  • Launch at Login: Option to start Sotto when Mac boots
  • Dock Icon Toggle: Hide dock icon for menu-bar only mode
  • Auto-load Model: Whisper model now loads automatically on startup
  • Renamed tabs: Instructions → App Modes, Dictionary → Vocabulary

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
Sotto 1.1 - AI Enhancement

  • AI Enhancement: Uses Groq Llama 3.3 to automatically clean up transcriptions
  • Removes filler words (um, uh, like, you know)
  • Fixes grammar and punctuation
  • Cleans up repeated words and false starts
  • Toggle on/off in Settings → Transcription

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
Sotto 1.0 - Initial Release

  • Voice-to-text dictation using WhisperKit (fully local, private)
  • Global hotkey to start/stop recording
  • Screen context awareness for improved accuracy
  • Custom vocabulary support
  • Transcription history with search
  • Auto-paste or clipboard output modes
  • Auto-update capability via Sparkle
